Title: OPT++
Body: Date: Tue, 05 Nov 1996 00:24:45 GMT Server: NCSA/1.5 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Thu, 27 Jun 1996 19:46:28 GMT Content-length: 1257 OPT++ OPT++ Opt++ is a tool for Database Query Optimization that uses the Object-Oriented features of the C++ programming language to simplify the task of implementing, extending and modifying an optimizer.
